wines.name: Chateau Margaux
wines.tasting_notes: Full-bodied with dark fruit flavors and earthy undertones.

wines.name: Sassicaia
wines.tasting_notes: Rich and complex with notes of blackberry, leather, and spice.

wines.name: Penfolds Grange
wines.tasting_notes: Intense and layered with flavors of dark cherry, chocolate, and oak.

wines.name: Opus One
wines.tasting_notes: Elegant and balanced with hints of blackcurrant, vanilla, and cedar.

wines.name: Vega Sicilia Unico
wines.tasting_notes: Velvety texture with flavors of plum, tobacco, and spice.

wines.name: Dominus Estate
wines.tasting_notes: Complex with notes of blackberry, licorice, and earthy minerals.

wines.name: Harlan Estate
wines.tasting_notes: Rich and opulent with flavors of dark fruit, mocha, and leather.

wines.name: Chateau Lafite Rothschild
wines.tasting_notes: Elegant and refined with notes of cassis, graphite, and cedar.

wines.name: Gaja Barbaresco
wines.tasting_notes: Aromas of roses and cherries with a long, spicy finish.

wines.name: Chateau d'Yquem
wines.tasting_notes: Luxurious and sweet with flavors of apricot, honey, and vanilla.
